title: Cursed Kingdom
description: The land is under a curse, and the player must seek out a way to lift it by collecting three rare ingredients and performing a ritual.
subquest: Find the ancient scroll containing the details of the curse.
Locate the first rare ingredient deep within the enchanted forest.
Solve the puzzles in the abandoned temple to obtain the second ingredient.
Brave the treacherous caves to retrieve the third ingredient.
Seek guidance from the wise sage to learn the ritual.
Perform the ritual at the cursed kingdom's center to lift the curse.
